summary: Count Dracula moves from Transylvania to Wismar, spreading the Black Plague across the land. Only a woman pure of heart can bring an end to his reign of horror.
cast: Klaus Kinski|Isabelle Adjani|Bruno Ganz|Roland Topor|Walter Ladengast|Dan van Husen|Jan Groth|Carsten Bodinus|Martje Grohmann|Rijk de Gooyer|Clemens Scheitz|Lo van Hensbergen|John Leddy|Margiet van Hartingsveld|Tim Beekman|Jacques Dufilho|Attila C. Arpa|Michael Edols|Werner Herzog|Stefan Husar|Norbert Losch|Johan te Slaa|Beverly Walker
title: Nosferatu, vampiro de la noche
